projects.title: portfolio
projects.description: you're looking at it now! the full (desktop) version features a dynamically generated background graphic based on the ground plan of hadrian's villa.

projects.title: lead block sports (full stack)
projects.description: sports blog platform built with the MERN stack; in addition to the main website, i created a separate admin dashboard to allow the author to independently update content.

projects.title: where's bosch?
projects.description: 'where's waldo?'-inspired web game built with react and firebase, featuring hieronymus bosch's 'garden of earthly delights'.

projects.title: secret society
projects.description: members-only web bulletin with secure login & authentication functionality.

projects.title: ArtCart
projects.description: demo online store with shopping cart functionality, a searchable catalog, dynamic page routing, and a tongue-in-cheek contemporary art market theme.

projects.title: campaign website
projects.description: informational website for a real local political candidate, built from scratch using vanilla js and custom css.

projects.title: brassicaDB
projects.description: searchable and editable vegetable-themed inventory site created with several back-end technologies.

projects.title: now // later
projects.description: streamlined to-do list web app with a unique frank lloyd wright-inspired design.

projects.title: graces
projects.description: simple informational website for my own seasonal food business, built with react with an eye toward ease of maintenance.

projects.title: battlesquares
projects.description: 'battleship'-inspired web game exemplifying key concepts in OOP and test-driven development.

projects.title: memory game
projects.description: simple react-based memory card game which makes use of component state and lifecycle methods.

projects.title: cv generator
projects.description: single-page react app for building a custom resume with a user-selected font and accent color.

projects.title: how's the weather?
projects.description: weather app powered by data from a third-party API; the gentle aesthetic features paintings by j.m.w. turner.

projects.title: apicius cafe
projects.description: informational website for an imaginary restaurant showcasing dynamic DOM manipulation and an ancient rome-inspired css theme.

projects.title: admin dashboard
projects.description: design concept for an admin dashboard page, laid out primarily using css grid.

projects.title: tic-tac-toe
projects.description: simple tic-tac-toe web game with a unique visual design - an early experiment in crafting a dynamic and unconventional user experience.

projects.title: book log
projects.description: web app to log a user's reading activity and annual reading goal.

projects.title: contact form
projects.description: contact form for an imaginary restaurant, developed as an exercise in form design and client-side form validation.

projects.title: pointillist etch-a-sketch
projects.description: early javascript project using an art historical etch-a-sketch concept to explore event-driven DOM manipulation.

projects.title: calculator
projects.description: another early javascript project - a fully functional digital calculator with an experimental visual design.
